bibl.title: The Limits of Palaeographic Dating of Literary Papyri: Some Observations on the Date and Provenance of P.Bodmer II (P66).
bibl.note: P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777). - Introduction. - The Original Publication and Subsequent Proposals for Dating P. Bodmer II. - Palaeographic Assessment and a Proposal. [Mid-second to mid-fourth century]. - Contextualizing P. Bodmer II among the Other Bodmer Papyri. - The Codicology of P. Bodmer II. - Conclusion. [Codicological features point to the early or middle part of the fourth century.] - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Brent Nongbri, The Limits of Palaeographic Dating of Literary Papyri: Some Observations on the Date and Provenance of P.Bodmer II (P66).

P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426; LDAB 2777). - Introduction. - The Original Publication and Subsequent Proposals for Dating P. Bodmer II. - Palaeographic Assessment and a Proposal. [Mid-second to mid-fourth century]. - Contextualizing P. Bodmer II among the Other Bodmer Papyri. - The Codicology of P. Bodmer II. - Conclusion. [Codicological features point to the early or middle part of the fourth century.] - Avec résumé en anglais.
